articles.author: Eyad Kourdi, Pauline Lo, Lauren Izso, Richard Allen Greene, Christian Edwards
articles.title: Hamas releases video of hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin in proof he survived Oct. 7 injuries - CNN
articles.description: Hamas released a video of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin on Wednesday, the first proof that he survived being badly wounded during his capture on October 7.
articles.content:
Editors Note: Warning: This story contains a graphic image.
